name: Compactor Demo
description:
Press escape to open pause menu, other than that the controls are provided in game.

Compactor is a little metroidvania that I've been working on for the past few months, and this demo is the product of that. It's not too long, so please check it out and give some feedback!

This is just the first area of the game which I have done so far. It includes up to the first boss and upgrade.

Feedback and bug reports are greatly appreciated!
